events.message: I purchased a jacket last week, but I want to request a refund because the size doesn't fit and I no longer need the product.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning the jacket.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. for handling the refund process and further communication.
Hello, thank you for contacting customer support. I’m Sarah and I’ll assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process your request as quickly as possible?
My order number is 123456789. I’m returning the jacket because the size is too small and it doesn’t fit me at all.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund for the jacket. You will receive a confirmation email shortly, and the refund will appear on your payment method in 5-7 business days.
Thanks for processing the refund so quickly. I appreciate your help and the prompt response to my issue.
The refund case for order 123456789 is now resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund to your account and if everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing this case. Thank you for reaching out to our support team.
